page.title: Germany Looking at Citigroup Bond Trading
page.text: BERLIN (Reuters) - Germany's financial watchdog said on Thursday it was looking into recent trading by U.S. financial services group Citigroup <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=C.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">C.N</A> in European government bond and derivative markets, but had not started a formal probe.
